plot: Weeks after the fall of the Earth Kingdom, Aang and his friends must infiltrate the Fire Nation. Katara meets her father for the first time in years. Zuko returns home, but is uneasy with his newfound reputation.

Many weeks have passed since Ba Sing Se has been seized by the Fire Nation. Aang finally wakes up from his coma after being shot down by Azula and he meets up with his friends on a Fire Nation vessel. Meanwhile, Zuko is welcomed back by the Fire Nation after his three year exile, he begins to feel uneasy about his return, Zuko assumes that Aang is still alive. Aang runs away from his friends again, he is stranded in the middle of the ocean during a storm. Aang is still upset that he failed to restore balance to the world, but Roku tells Aang that he should've prevented Sozin from starting the war and he convinces Aang that he can still redeem himself. Yue encourages Aang not to give up because the world still needs the Avatar to put an end to the war. Moved by Roku and Yue's words of encouragement, Aang makes it to the Crescent Island, where the Fire Temple was once there. Aang reunites with his friends, but he decides to burn his broken glider and keep his status a secret for the time being.—dawsonpersi
